name: DreamCraft Entertainment, Inc.
long_description: DreamCraft enables anyone to create, publish, and monetize video games. The companyâ€™s core product is a code-free game creation platform, bundled with high quality art assets. DreamCraft is backed by March Capital, Makers Fund, Tencent Corporation, Y Combinator, and other top investors in the gaming space. The company was founded in 2018 and now has a global team of 20+ people with half remote and half based in Silicon Valley.
one_liner: Platform that allows anyone to create and monetize video games.
